title: Jonathan Kodjia - Player profile | Transfermarkt
snippet: Jonathan Kodjia is a 36-year old football player aus Cote d'Ivoire, (* Oct 22, 1989 in Saint-Denis, France). Kodjia is Jul 1, 2025 without a club since. He plays in the position Centre-Forward. His market value is €75k.

title: Jonathan Kodjia - Wikipedia
snippet: Jonathan Adjo Kodjia (born 22 October 1989) is a professional footballer who plays as a forward for Championnat National club Versailles.
